docs.title: This is a work in progress
docs.text:
None shall pass... for now. You may check this for further information.

You may take a look at my projects as well as my current ones.

Oh, and maybe that kind of blog thing...

Looking for a résumé perhaps ?

docs.text:
• A dataviz study on the LuxLeaks scandal
